task.summary: Added title to stream on front-page
Added title to stream on front-page
Fixed not showing komments link in feed when no comments and no post permission
Vis rett antall inviterte i invite portlet
Ikke vis deaktiverte brukere i invite
Ta hensyn til deaktiverte brukere i medlemstelling
Show correct number of members on group overview
Fixed owner permissions, added ordering of group membership roles
Added friendly url for view membership
User url in feed to hioa.no/tilsatt
View more working again in contacts portlet
LIF-334 Alloy editor updated to v 1.3.0
LIF-338 Like for comments and posts
LIF-334 Enforce mentions in additional alert fields, avoid additional linebreaks when mentioning in normal fields, multiple css fixes
